titles.title: A resolution designating Jean M. Manning as Chief Counsel for Employment Emeritus of the United States Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 3/13/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates Jean M. Manning as Chief Counsel for Employment Emeritus of the United States Senate, as a token of the appreciation of the Senate for her long and faithful service. Makes such designation effective upon her retirement on March 19, 2014.
